hadiths.text: It was narrated from Salim, from his father, that:he used to denounce stipulating conditions in Hajj and said: "Is not the Sunnah of your Prophet sufficient for you? If one of you is prevented (from completing Hajj) by anything, let him come to the House and circumambulate it, and (perform Sai) between As-Safa and Al-Marwah, then let him shave his head or cut his hair, then exit Ihram; and he has to perform Hajj the next year

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَفْعَلُ مَنْ حُبِسَ عَنِ الْحَجِّ، وَلَمْ يَكُنِ اشْتَرَطَ .
chapter.eng-name: What Is Done By The One Who Was Prevented During Hajj Without Having Stipulated A Condition
